name: The "FNF" Collection
description:
Welcome to The "FNF" Collection! This is inspired by the FNF community for making amazing mods for the game. Also, game takes time to load. Please be patient.

Controls (Menu)

A or D - Choose a song

Space - Select song

Controls (In game)

WASD - Character on the left

Arrow keys - Character on the right

It contains:

- 2 songs from Tricky (Foxy vs Bonnie)

- 1 song from Tabi (Golden vs Baby)

- 3 songs from Sky (Six vs Bonnie) Also, I renamed the songs so it could fit the character better.

- 1 Song from Salty's Sunday Night (ENA And Bonnie) Renamed the song as well.

Hope you have fun :)

Ps:

The game doesn't have the arrows mechanic YET. I'm still trying to figure out how to make one. For now, is just a showcase for movesets for each character. You could still make your own rhythm.

Thank you for reading. Now you can play it.
